course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Understanding and Excelling in the New World of Sustainable Business
course.description: This course will provide an understanding of the fundamental aspects of sustainability, both environmentally and socially, and both in terms of risk and regulatory compliance, as well as a driver of corporate advantage and leadership. It is designed both for those who want to understand the basics of sustainability as a dynamic within their generalist careers, as well as those who might consider leadership positions in corporate sustainability.
